results.title: Metformin represses bladder cancer progression by inhibiting stem cell repopulation via COX2/PGE2/STAT3 axis
results.text_hl: Data from both in vitro and in vivo experiments suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may not be able to prevent @DISEASE_Urinary_Bladder_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001749 @@@bladder cancer@@@ initiation but it appeared to be capable of slowing down the progression both from mild to moderate/severe @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Dysplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015792 @@@dysplasia@@@ lesions and from @DISEASE_Carcinoma_in_Situ @DISEASE_MESH:D002278 @@@CIS@@@ lesions to invasive lesions.

citations.NLM: Liu Q, Yuan W, Tong D, Liu G, Lan W, Zhang D, Xiao H, Zhang Y, Huang Z, Yang J, Zhang J, Jiang J. Metformin represses bladder cancer progression by inhibiting stem cell repopulation via COX2/PGE2/STAT3 axis Oncotarget. 2016 May 10;7(19):28235-46. PMID: 27058422
citations.BibTeX: @article{27058422, title={Metformin represses bladder cancer progression by inhibiting stem cell repopulation via COX2/PGE2/STAT3 axis}, author={Liu Q and Yuan W and Tong D and Liu G and Lan W and Zhang D and Xiao H and Zhang Y and Huang Z and Yang J and Zhang J and Jiang J}, journal={Oncotarget}, volume={7}, number={19}, pages={28235-46}}

results.title: Metformin can block precancerous progression to invasive tumors of bladder through inhibiting STAT3-mediated signaling pathways
results.text_hl: Upon treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Methylnitrosourea @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008770 @@@MNU@@@-induced @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were only detected with @<m>DISEASE_Retinal_Dysplasia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D015792 @@@dysplasia@@@, @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Papillary @DISEASE_MESH:D002291 @@@papillary tumors@@@ and @DISEASE_Carcinoma_in_Situ @DISEASE_MESH:D002278 @@@CIS@@@.

citations.NLM: Pan Q, Yang GL, Yang JH, Lin SL, Liu N, Liu SS, Liu MY, Zhang LH, Huang YR, Shen RL, Liu Q, Gao JX, Bo JJ. Metformin can block precancerous progression to invasive tumors of bladder through inhibiting STAT3-mediated signaling pathways J Exp Clin Cancer Res. 2015 Aug 7;34(1):77. PMID: 26245871
